trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Port Huron
There were no other sightings in Port Huron on or around October 1st 2011
divs: Sighting Detailswent outside and my son said look up over there we all looked (there were five of us), I said at first it's because of the clouds, then keep looking and to my amazment there were lights moving north! the more I looked I could see clusters moving in the same direction I called someone 30 miles south but they could not see anything besides stars, never seen anything like that in my life other then on youtube I did not have a camera, wondering if anyone seen what we seen last night.
Summary: about twenty to thrity lights moving north towards canada
